signature_matches.description: Opens an internet connection
May access the Android keyguard (lock screen)
Suricata IDS alerts for network traffic
match_data: 2036303 - Severity 1 - ET HUNTING Terse Unencrypted Request for Google - Likely Connectivity Check : 192.168.122.100:37942 -> 173.194.193.99:80

signature_matches.description: Checks if debugger is running
Queries the SIM provider numeric MCC+MNC (mobile country code + mobile network code)
Loads advertisement
Has permissions to create, read or change account settings (inlcuding account password settings)
Queries list of running processes/tasks
Registers a Sensor listener (to get data about accelerometer, gyrometer etc.)
Lists and deletes files in the same context
Uses the DexClassLoader (often used for code injection)
Uses HTTPS
Uses HTTP for connecting to the internet
Uses DownloadManager to fetch additional components
Reads shares settings
Connects to IPs without corresponding DNS lookups
Checks if phone is rooted (checks for Superuser.apk)
Has functionalty to add an overlay to other apps
Obfuscates method names
Loads native libraries
Queries stored mail and application accounts (e.g. Gmail or Whatsup)
Installs a new wake lock (to get activate on phone screen on)
Has permission to read the phones state (phone number, device IDs, active call ect.)
Acquires a wake lock
URLs found in memory or binary data
Creates SQLiteDatabase table
Checks an internet connection is available
Accesses external storage location
Accesses android OS build fields
May dial phone number
Queries package code path (often used for patching other applications)
Classification label
Performs DNS lookups (Java API)
Requests potentially dangerous permissions
Queries the network operator numeric MCC+MNC (mobile country code + mobile network code)
Queries several sensitive phone informations
Checks if phone is rooted (checks for test-keys build tags)
Checks CPU details
Queries the unique operating system id (ANDROID_ID)
Unable to instrument or execute APK, no dynamic information has been logged
Sets an intent to the APK data type (used to install other APKs)
Adjust ring tone volume
Uses Crypto APIs
Uses secure TLS version for HTTPS connections
Has permission to execute code after phone reboot
Queries the phones location (GPS)
Uses reflection

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO Google DNS Over HTTPS Certificate Inbound
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert tls $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Google DNS Over HTTPS Certificate Inbound"; flow:established,to_client; threshold: type both, track by_src, count 1, seconds 300; tls.cert_subject; content:"CN=dns.google"; endswith; fast_pattern; tls.cert_issuer; content:"C=US, O=Google Trust Services"; reference:url,developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/doh/; reference:md5,206a146a84eb6c2cca82ac245615349a; reference:md5,8064d8e4bfa66d1b6f665faf1ddf46b2; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2049796; rev:5; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2019_08_21, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag DoH, updated_at 2023_12_20, reviewed_at 2024_04_22, former_sid 2838109; target:src_ip;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET HUNTING Terse Unencrypted Request for Google - Likely Connectivity Check
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET 80 (msg:"ET HUNTING Terse Unencrypted Request for Google - Likely Connectivity Check"; flow:established,to_server; http.request_line; content:"GET / "; startswith; http.host; dotprefix; content:".google.com"; fast_pattern; http.header_names; content:!"|0d 0a|Referer|0d 0a|"; content:!"|0d 0a|User-Agent|0d 0a|"; content:!"|0d 0a|Accept"; reference:md5,7ca63bab6e05704d2c7b48461e563f4c; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2036303; rev:2; metadata:created_at 2022_04_22, performance_impact Moderate, confidence Medium, signature_severity Major, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2022_04_22;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET POLICY External IP Lookup ip-api.com
ids_alerts.rule_category: Device Retrieving External IP Address Detected
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY External IP Lookup ip-api.com"; flow:established,to_server; http.host; content:"ip-api.com"; classtype:external-ip-check; sid:2022082; rev:6; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2015_11_13, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_11_26, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET POLICY External IP Lookup api.ipify.org
ids_alerts.rule_category: Device Retrieving External IP Address Detected
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY External IP Lookup api.ipify.org"; flow:established,to_server; urilen:1; http.method; content:"GET"; http.host; content:"api.ipify.org"; fast_pattern; reference:md5,79809fd3e05a852581b897cc4b06aa32; classtype:external-ip-check; sid:2021997; rev:6; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2015_10_23, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_11_26, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)
